thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: EU Could Deploy Spending Threats in Fight with Warsaw

author: Laurence Norman
title: EU Could Deploy Spending Threats in Fight with Warsaw
text:
Poland’s new prime minister fired some of the most nationalistic members of his government on Tuesday, hours ahead of a trip to Brussels aimed at easing tensions with the European Union as it considers budget changes that could see deep cuts in eastern Europe.

Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki replaced his ministers of defense and foreign affairs, two harsh critics of the EU, along with more minor cabinet members, with officials broadly seen as friendlier toward the bloc. The shuffle comes a month after the EU’s executive...
